content: type of instructions - written instructions - english only and us crochet terminology used - visual help - paid version only - multiples included - paid version only - stitch breakdown - paid version only skill level - you must know how to crochet - you must know how to read a crochet pattern - you must know basic crochet stitches - chain single_crochet skip double_crochet etc - you must know how to skip stitches - you must know how to follow crochet written instructions - best for advanced beginners to intermediate crocheters finished size - 26 15 x 27 5 inches approx yarn & hook - yarnsmiths pebble haze aran or any aran yarn - caron blossom cakes or any aran yarn - scrap yarn was used for the border so no yards will be given for this - 5mm crochet hook terms of use - for personal use only do not copy share or sell the pattern in part or whole you may sell the finished item made using this pattern refund policy - all digital sales are final about truly crochet is my blog where i share my latest free crochet patterns this version on etsy is an ad-free pdf version of my free pattern
